tool_description: Empowering Your Business with Comprehensive WHOIS Data at Your Fingertips. The Global WHOIS Lookup API is a powerful tool designed to provide detailed WHOIS information for domains worldwide. It allows users to access domain registration details, including registrar information, registration dates, and more.
name: Global WHOIS Lookup - Discover Domain Details Instantly
title: Global WHOIS Lookup - Discover Domain Details Instantly
tool_name: Global WHOIS Lookup - Discover Domain Details Instantly

api_list.name: /{domain}
api_list.description:
The Global WHOIS Lookup API is a powerful tool designed to provide detailed WHOIS information for domains worldwide. It allows users to access domain registration details, including registrar information, registration dates, and more.

Example Response:

```
{
  "OrganizationName": null,
  "Raw": "   Domain Name: MAGICAPI.COMrn   Registry Domain ID: 1593668876_DOMAIN_COM-VRSNrn   Registrar WHOIS Server: whois.name.comrn   Registrar URL: http://www.name.comrn   Updated Date: 2023-10-29T07:10:20Zrn   Creation Date: 2010-04-21T05:17:17Zrn   Registry Expiry Date: 2024-04-21T05:17:17Zrn   Registrar: Name.com, Inc.rn   Registrar IANA ID: 625rn   Registrar Abuse Contact Email: abuse@name.comrn   Registrar Abuse Contact Phone: 7202492374rn   Domain Status: clientTransferProhibited https://icann.org/epp#clientTransferProhibitedrn   Name Server: NS1.VERCEL-DNS.COMrn   Name Server: NS2.VERCEL-DNS.COMrn   DNSSEC: unsignedrn   URL of the ICANN Whois Inaccuracy Complaint Form: https://www.icann.org/wicf/rn>>> Last update of whois database: 2024-01-03T17:18:53Z <<<rnrnFor more information on Whois status codes, please visit https://icann.org/epprnrnNOTICE: The expiration date displayed in this record is the date thernregistrar's sponsorship of the domain name registration in the registry isrncurrently set to expire. The compilation,rnrepackaging, dissemination or other use of this Data is expresslyrnprohibited without the prior written consent of VeriSign. api_list.code:
```
import requests

url = "https://global-whois-lookup-discover-domain-details-instantly.p.rapidapi.com/pipfeed.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-whois-lookup-discover-domain-details-instantly.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-whois-lookup-discover-domain-details-instantly.p.rapidapi.com/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-whois-lookup-discover-domain-details-instantly.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
